titleStmt.title: The Declaration of His Excellencie the Lord Generall Fairfax, and his generall councell of officers shewing the grounds of the armies advance towards the city of London.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Army. Council.

notesStmt.note: "By the appointment of His Excellency the Lord Fairfax Lord Generall, and his generall councell of officers held at Windsor, November 30, 1648, signed, John Rushworth, secretary."
This item is identified as Wing D610 variant at reel 276:10 and as Wing F145A (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996) at reel 1009:36 as Wing F145A (number cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996)).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
